channel.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - Empire in Flames (Part 2)
channel.description:
In our newest episode, @Coalhada and I wrap-up our coverage of The Enemy Within campaign. It has been quite a journey!
Check it out here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/january-17th-2022
